item.title: SM Entertainment has reportedly lost ₩200 billion (~$150 million) following news of EXO Chen, Baekhyun and Xiumin's lawsuit to terminate their contracts with the agency.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: BLACKPINK's Jennie stuns at the Chanel métiers d’art show in Tokyo.

item.title: ‘Shake It Off’ by Taylor Swift re-enters Global Spotify at #197 with 1.1 million streams.

item.title: ‘Queencard’ by (G)I-DLE rises to a new peak of #99 on Global Spotify with 1.45 million streams.

item.title: Stray Kids' ‘★★★★★ (5-STAR)’ has recorded over 5.13 million pre-orders, the first album in K-Pop history to surpass this milestone.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Lover’ by Taylor Swift has surpassed 6 BILLION streams on Spotify. It is her most streamed album on the platform.
item.author: PopBase
